response.overview: Four stories reveal the truth about the lives of people with disabilities and autism, highlighting the importance of acceptance and compassion. Two schoolboys struggle to find their place in the new school, the city shows injustice in environmental accessibility, and work becomes a test of human dignity. Friendship demonstrates how even small steps can change the world. Through quiet observation, Marios comes to the conclusion that real change begins when we look at the world with other eyes - eyes full of struggle, where each struggle makes us wiser and closer to one another.
response.title: A Day Through My Eyes
